COURT_INFORMATION.appellate_court: High Court of Kenya at Nairobi
trial_judges: Honorable Resident Magistrate H. M. Mbati (Mrs.)

key_legal_issues: Extension of parental responsibility beyond the age of 18
Financial capability and obligations of a parent towards a child's education
Interpretation of Section 28(1) of the Children Act

OUTCOMES.trial_outcome: Defendant ordered to pay Kshs. 132,500 towards school fees

relief_granted.trial: Payment of school fees by the defendant

legal_principles_established: Extension of parental responsibility under special circumstances
LEGAL_PRINCIPLES.precedent_value: Clarifies conditions for extending parental responsibility

procedural_history: Judgment by the Children’s Court: 21st February, 2018

key_evidence: Admission letter to East African Institute of Certified Studies
